      public static Account findAccount​(Post post) throws PostIDNotRecognisedException
      Used to find Account with given Post (posted by the Account)
      Parameters:
      post - Post of the Account to search for
      Returns:
      author Account of the Post
      Throws:
      PostIDNotRecognisedException - if Post with given ID does not exist

    • changeHandle

      public static void changeHandle​(java.lang.String oldHandle, java.lang.String newHandle) throws HandleNotRecognisedException, IllegalHandleException, InvalidHandleException
      Changes the handle of the Account
      Parameters:
      oldHandle - handle of the Account to change
      newHandle - Account's new handle
      Throws:
      HandleNotRecognisedException - if Account with given oldHandle does not exist
      IllegalHandleException - if given newHandle is not unique
      InvalidHandleException - if given newHandle is not in appropriate form
